Param.Value: #1水分仪
Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Persist Security Info =true;Data Source=D:\化验设备数据\#1水分仪\WsM700.mdb;

SELECT 称量瓶位置 as czpwz,试样编号 as sybh,试样名称 as symc,煤种 as mz,水分 as sf,皮重 as pz,试样重量 as syzl,称量瓶残重 as czpcz,称量瓶残重1 as czpcz1,称量瓶残重2 as czpcz2,称量瓶残重3 as czpcz3,称量瓶残重4 as czpcz4,称量瓶残重5 as czpcz5,称量瓶残重6 as czpcz6, 结果小数位数 as jgxsws,最低小数取舍 as zdxsqs,水分平均值 as sfpjz from CoalMoisture
#2水分仪
Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Persist Security Info =true;Data Source=D:\化验设备数据\#2水分仪\WsM700.mdb;

SELECT 称量瓶位置 as czpwz,试样编号 as sybh,试样名称 as symc,煤种 as mz,水分 as sf,皮重 as pz,试样重量 as syzl,称量瓶残重 as czpcz,称量瓶残重1 as czpcz1,称量瓶残重2 as czpcz2,称量瓶残重3 as czpcz3,称量瓶残重4 as czpcz4,称量瓶残重5 as czpcz5,称量瓶残重6 as czpcz6, 结果小数位数 as jgxsws,最低小数取舍 as zdxsqs,水分平均值 as sfpjz from CoalMoisture
#3测硫仪
Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Persist Security Info =true;Data Source=D:\化验设备数据\#3测硫仪\data.db;
SELECT * from result where date1>=date()-365 ORDER BY date1
#1量热仪
Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Persist Security Info =true;Data Source=D:\化验设备数据\#1量热仪\C800.Mdb;

SELECT 索引 as sy, 自动编号 as ZDBH,试样名称 as SYMC,仪器编号 as YQBH,氧弹编号 as YDBH,测试内容 as CSLR,高低位热值 as GDWRZ,测试方法 as CSFF,仪器热容量 as YQRRL,试样重量 as SSZL,弹筒发热量 as DTFRL,化验员 as hyy , 测试日期 as csrq,测试时间 as cssj from testresult where 测试日期>date()-365 ORDER BY 测试日期

Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Persist Security Info =true;Data Source=D:\化验设备数据\#5量热仪\win5e.Mdb;jet oledb:Database Password=CSKY

#1碳氢仪
Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Persist Security Info =true;Data Source=D:\化验设备数据\#1碳氢仪\SDCHData2020.mdb;jet oledb:Database Password=service

SELECT 试样编号 as SYBH,方法 as FF,[样重(mg)] as YZ,[Mad%] as Mad,[Cad%] as Cad,[Cd%] as Cd,[浓度(C)] as NDC,[初始(C)] as CSC,[实验(C)] as SYC,[AD量(C)] as ADLC,[原始值(C)] as YSZC,[空白(C)] as KBC,[漂移(C)] as PYC,[Had%] as HAD,[HD%] as HD,[浓度(H)] as NDH,[初始(H)] as CSH,[实验(H)] as SYH,[AD量(H)] as ADLH,[原始值(H)] as YSZH,[空白(H)] as KBH,[漂移(H)] as PYH,[Nad%] as NAD,[ND%] as ND,开始基值 as KSJZ,积分值 as JFZ,[浓度(N)] as NDN,积分次数 as JFCS,[空白(N)] as KBN,[漂移(N)] as PYN,基线校正 as JXXZ,[初始(P)] as CSP,[预测(P)] as YCP,[环境(P)] as HJP,[碳标定(P)] as TBDP,[氢标定(P)] as QBDP,[氮标定(P)] as DBDP,[集气(P)] as JQP,燃烧完全 as RSWQ,化验员 as HYY,测试日期 as CSRQ,开始时间 as KSSJ,结束时间 as JSSJ,自动编号 as ZDBH,卡号 as KH,ID,[Aad%] as AAD,[原始值(N)] as YSZN ,Stad,Std,[Cdaf%] as cdaf, [Hdaf%] as hdaf,[Ndaf%] as ndaf,DrifWay,Ht_ad,AutoDirf_H FROM SDCH235 where 测试日期 > date()-365 order by 测试日期 asc

#3工分仪
Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Persist Security Info =true;Data Source=D:\化验设备数据\#3工分仪\G400.mdb;

select 试样编号 as SYBH,坩埚位置 as GGWZ,试样名称 as SYMC,水分空坩埚重 as SFKGGZ,灰分空坩埚重 as HFKGGZ,挥发分空坩埚重 as HFFKGGZ,挥发分试样重量 as HFFSYZL,水分试样重量 as SFSYZL,灰分试样重量 as HFSYZL,未校正水分 as WSZSF,水残重 as SCZ,水残重1 as SCZ1,水残重2 as SCZ2,水残重3 as SCZ3,水残重4 as SCZ4,水残重5 as SCZ5,水残重6 as SCZ6,水分 as SF,水分平均值 as SFPJZ,灰毛残重 as HMCZ,未校正空干基灰分 as WSZKGJHF,灰残重 as HCZ,灰残重1 as HCZ1,灰残重2 as HCZ2,灰残重3 as HCZ3,灰残重4 as HCZ4,灰残重5 as HCZ5,灰残重6 as HCZ6,空干基灰分平均值 as KGJHFPJZ,空干基灰分 as KGJHF,干基灰分 as GJHF,收到基灰分 as SDJHF,挥发分加盖重 as HFFJGZ,挥发分残重 as HFFCZ, 挥发分残重1 as HFFCZ1,空干基挥发分平均值 as KGJHFFPJZ,空干基挥发分 as KGJHFF,干基挥发分 as GJHFF,未校正空干基挥发分 as WXZKGJHHF,干燥无灰基挥发分 as GZWHJHFF,热值 as RZ,氢含量 as QHL,空干基固定碳含量 as KGJGDTHL,干基固定碳含量 as GZGDTHL,干燥无灰基固定碳含量 as GZWHGDTHL ,二氧化碳含量 as EYHTHL,灰渣可燃物 as HZKRW,全水 as QS,高位热值 as GWRZ,低位热值 as DWRZ,焦渣号 as JZH,煤种 as MZ,班次 as BC,干基硫 as GJL,空干基硫 as KGJL,测试日期 as CSRQ,测试时间 as CSSKJ,测试项目 as SCXM,化验员 as HYY,小数位数 as XSWS ,是灰渣 as SHZ,仪器编号 as YQBH,备注 as BZ,备用1 as BZ1,备用2 as BZ2,备用3 as BZ3,备用4 as BZ4,备用5 as BZ5,真相对密度 as ZXDMD from TestResultG400 where 测试日期 > Date()-3 order by 测试日期 asc
